price: No se reprochaban unos a otros los pecados que cometían. ¡Qué perversa era su forma de actuar!
arabic: كَانُواْ لَا يَتَنَاهَوۡنَ عَن مُّنكَرٖ فَعَلُوهُۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kānū lā yatanāhawna ʿan munkarin faʿalūhu labi'sa mā kānū yafʿalūna
